TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Route new and changed records based on NEW_FLAG and CHANGED_FLAG
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Records

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: FRMLY_ID = In_FRMLY_ID AND FRMLY_SRC_CD = In_FRMLY_SRC_CD AND CORP_OWNR_ID = In_CORP_OWNR_ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Exp_Detect_Changes

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(Tgt_FRMLY_ID) AND NOT ISNULL(Tgt_FRMLY_SRC_CD) AND NOT ISNULL(Tgt_CORP_OWNR_ID) AND ( Tgt_FRMLY_NM!=Src_FRMLY_NM or Tgt_FRMLY_EFF_DT!=Src_FRMLY_EFF_DT or Tgt_FRMLY_EXPRN_DT!=Src_FRMLY_EXPRN_DT), 1, 0 )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: Changed_Flag

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT TFC.FRMLY_ID ,TFC.FRMLY_SRC_CD ,TC.CORP_CD ,TFC.FORMULARY_NM ,TFC.EFF_DT ,TFC.END_DT FROM VRAP.TFORMULARY_CONSOLIDATED TFC, VRAP.TCORP TC

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Route new and changed records based on NEW_FLAG and CHANGED_FLAG
INSTANCE.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Records

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
INSTANCE.NAME: Exp_Detect_Changes

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: A high-level organizational user of the companys rebates platform, identified/distinguished to support the separate management of system Security, Firewall and Connectivity issues and controls.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TCORP
